commands.name: az vmss rolling-upgrade cancel
commands.summary: Cancel the current virtual machine scale set rolling upgrade.
commands.syntax:
az vmss rolling-upgrade cancel [--ids]
                               [--name]
                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--subscription]

commands.name: az vmss rolling-upgrade get-latest
commands.summary: Get the status of the latest virtual machine scale set rolling upgrade.

commands.name: az vmss rolling-upgrade start
commands.summary: Start a rolling upgrade to move all virtual machine scale set instances to the latest available Platform Image OS version. Instances which are already running the latest available OS version are not affected.
commands.syntax:
az vmss rolling-upgrade start [--ids]
                              [--name]
                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--resource-group]
                              [--subscription]
